extension_description.message: SkipTo.js provides keyboard navigation to landmark regions and headings to meet WCAG 2.4.1 Bypass Blocks requirement.

options_button_menu_content_reset.description: Label for reset menu content default button

options_button_style_reset.description: Label for reset styling to default button

options_button_i18n_reset.description: Label for resetting labels to english to button

options_heading_h1.description: Include only h1 headings from page in menu

options_heading_h2.description: Include h1 and h2 headings from page in menu

options_heading_h3.description: Include h1, h2 and h3 headings from page in menu

options_heading_h4.description: Include h1, h2, h3 and h4 headings from page in menu

options_heading_h5.description: Include h1, h2, h3, h4 and h5 headings from page in menu

options_heading_h6.description: Include h1, h2, h3, h4, h5 and h6 headings from page in menu

options_heading_main_only.message: Only show headings in main landmark region
options_heading_main_only.description: Only include headings in the main landmark region from page in menu

options_landmark_doc_order.description: Label for showing landmarks in document order checkbox

options_button_text_color.message: Skip To Content' button text color

options_button_background_color.message: Skip To Content' button background color

options_focus_border_color.message: Skip To Content' button focus border color

options_highlight_legend.message: Highlight Content when navigating menu options

options_highlight_instant_label.description: Checkbox label for instant highlight option

options_highlight_smooth_label.description: Checkbox label for smooth highlight option

options_legend_button_labels.description: Legend for i18n for button related labels

options_shortcut_name_label.description: Label for i18n for shortcut name

options_alt_name_label.description: Label for i18n for ALT key name

options_option_name_label.description: Label for i18n for OPTION key name

options_legend_menu_labels.description: Legend for i18n for menu related labels

options_menu_label.description: Label for i18n for menu of  landmarks and headings

options_landmark_group_label.description: Legend for i18n for landmark group label

options_heading_group_label.description: Legend for i18n for heading group label

options_heading_main_group_label.message: Headings in Main Region Group Label
options_heading_main_group_label.description: Legend for i18n for heading main group label

options_heading_level_label.description: Legend for i18n for heading level label

options_legend_landmark_labels.description: Legend for i18n for landmark name related labels

options_button_label.description: Label for skip to content button

options_small_button_label.description: Label for skip to content button when screen is narrow

options_contentinfo_region_name.description: Label for content information region name

options_button_button_content_reset.description: Label for reset button defaults button

options_button_border_label.message: Bottom border of button always visible

options_button_border_desc.message: Making the bottom border visible at the top of the page allows user to use the pointer to easily expose the button.

options_button_focus_desc.message: When a new page loads some users may not want the button visible since it obscures some content or may be distracting visually.  Others may want the menu to be open when the page loads to eliminate the extra keystrokes needed to open the menu.

options_button_shortcuts_reset.description: Label for reset page navigation defaults button

options_enable_shortcuts_label.message: Enable page navigation with shortcut keys

options_region_legend.description: Legend for region landmark navigation shortcuts

options_shortcuts_enabled_label.description: Menuitem indicating the shortcuts are enabled

options_shortcuts_disabled_label.description: Menuitem indicating the shortcuts are disabled

options_shortcut_info_label.description: Menu item to open a shortcut information dialog box
